comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Friedrich_Leopold_of_Prussia His wife is en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Louise_Sophie_of_Schleswig... This does not look like en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Friedrich_Karl_of_Prussia_%2... but could be en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Friedrich_Sigismund_of_Pruss...
